thread.section_title: Dior US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dior US | dior-us.com | 6 of 95
thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text:
Cancelled my order for no reason. When I sent an email and asked for the probable cause, I got email back with "This means that we review every order prior to processing and this order did not meet our requirements." I've never had customer service emails with such attitude ever. Ridiculous.
I like Dior products, but when it's a special gift for Valentines day, Neiman Marcus would be a better choice.
